co.cask.cdap.api.spark.Spark

Packages that use Spark
co.cask.cdap.api.app An Application is a logical grouping of Streams, Datasets, Flows, Procedures, and other deployable elements. 
co.cask.cdap.api.spark Defines APIs for defining Spark jobs in CDAP. 
co.cask.cdap.internal.spark This package contains internal classes for supporting the CDAP API.
